plot: A pair of dim bulb burglars happen onto a mysteriously jolly college professor who takes an inordinate interest in details of their profession, to the point of allowing them to... steal all...
title: A Toast to J. Edgar Hoover

original_name: A Toast to J. Edgar Hoover
